Choose from a 4-night Seacation crossing the Tasman, to an indulgent 114-night World Voyage, and everything in between - including idyllic Transpacific Voyages through the Pacific Islands, and close-to-home cruises along our own stunning shores. 07 Apr 26 - View more View less 4 Night Cruise from $ 835 per person share twin Interior Stateroom* Flights are additional Cruising with Princess Cruises Sale Period : until sold out Departs 21 Feb 26 | Sailing with Princess Cruises 7 Apr 26 | Sailing with Princess Cruises 6 May 26 | Sailing with Princess Cruises 4 Jul 26 | Sailing with Princess Cruises 29 Aug 26 | Sailing with Princess Cruises 3 Oct 26 | Sailing with Princess Cruises 4 Nov 26 | Sailing with Princess Cruises 2 Apr 27 | Sailing with Princess Cruises 17 Jun 27 | Sailing with Princess Cruises Princess Cruises Onboard Inclusions Princess accommodations Main Meals & Snacks at A La Carte Restaurant, Horizon Court/World Fresh Marketplace Buffet, Award-winning Pizzeria, Poolside Burger-grill and Swirls Ice Cream Kids Clubs Pools, heated spas & gym Broadway style nightly entertainment & comedy shows On-Demand Stateroom TV Entertainment MedallionClass Experience® A personalised cruise experience powered by wearable technology for faster boarding, keyless stateroom entry, and enhanced service Upgrade to Princess Plus® or Princess Premier® for new bookings made for voyages sailing January 2026 and beyond Princess Plus® $92 per person per day, pre-cruise price. All ships excluding Sun or Star Princess. Wi-Fi, Plus Beverage Package, Casual dining meals, Room Service Delivery, and Bottled Water. Princess Plus® $97 per person per day, pre-cruise price. Sun or Star Princess. Wi-Fi, Plus Beverage Package, Casual dining meals, Room Service Delivery, and Bottled Water. Princess Premier® $149 per person per day, pre-cruise price. All ships excluding Sun or Star Princess. Multi-Device Wi-Fi, Unlimited Premier Beverage Package, Unlimited Specialty Dining, Unlimited Casual Dining Meals, Shore Excursion credit, Reserved Theatre seating, Photo package, Room Service Delivery, and Bottled Water. Princess Premier® $155 per person per day, pre-cruise price. Sun or Star Princess. Multi-Device Wi-Fi, Unlimited Premier Beverage Package, Unlimited Specialty Dining, Unlimited Casual Dining Meals, Shore Excursion credit, Reserved Theatre seating, Photo package, Room Service Delivery, and Bottled Water. Crown Princess® / Back Discovery Princess® / Back Terms & Conditions *5 nights from $835pp share twin Interior Stateroom based on Crown Princess cruise departing 04Nov26 from Sydney to Auckland. Gratuities are additional : USD$17 per person per day for guests staying in balconies, ocean views and interiors, USD$18 per person per day for mini suites, cabanas, and club class staterooms, and USD$19 per person per day for suites. All cruise packages are based on Twin share, inside cabin and costs are per person. Availability is current as at 28 Oct 25 and deals are available until date shown or until sold out. Space is strictly limited and is subject to availability at time of booking. On board credit where shown is per cabin & must be spent on board and is not refundable in cash. All passengers are bound by the individual cruise lines terms & conditions, please ask your consultant for a full copy. Current Deals must be paid in full at time of booking or deposit dates as shown. All passengers must have a valid passport with more than 6 months validity at the end of their holiday. Travel insurance should be taken out at time of booking to cover in the event of any unforeseen cancellation. Included airfares are based on special non refundable economy fares, ground transfers are not included unless specified, any hotels included are on a room only basis unless specified. Hotels in certain destinations in Europe, USA and Asia may require local tourist taxes or resort fees payable at check in, We aim to give an indication of these where possible, but unfortunately you cannot pre pay this aspect of the hotel rate and must settle at check in. ESTA Visas are required for Itineraries visiting USA ,Canada, India, China, Vietnam, Schengen states & Sri Lanka. Visa costs are not included. Passports must be valid at least 6 months after the end of your holiday, If travelling on a non NZ passport other visas + NZ re-entry permits may also be required, please check with applicable embassy. Passport validity, Visas, Vaccinations and health requirements are the responsibility of the passengers. Individual cruise line T&C will apply based on the cruise line booked. from $ 835 per person share twin Interior Stateroom* Flights are additional Enquire now Close options Enquire now Call: 0800 713 715 Book a video call Cruise Sail from Auckland with Princess Cruises From Close-to-Home to World Cruise Enquire now Call: 0800 713 715 Book a video call Quick links Cruises Deals Destinations Flights Holidays Online Brochures Stores & Consultants About HOT Why HOT Careers Email Sign Up Gift Cards Travel insurance Video Appointments Media Centre Help & Support Contact us Help and Support Payment Options Privacy Policy T&Cs - Instore Bookings T&C’s - Online Flight Bookings Website Usage © House of Travel 2004-2024 The House of Travel App Want the insider word on all things travel?
